meanings.definition: Serving as an explanation or addition to clarify a preceding word or phrase.
meanings.sent1: The epexegetical note at the end of the chapter helped me understand the story better.
meanings.sent2: Her epexegetical comments after the lecture clarified the confusing topic.
meanings.sent3: The epexegetical diagram on the board made the class burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: His epexegetical analogy shed light on the complex issue like a beacon in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's epexegetical examples made the concept crystal clear to the students.

meanings.definition: Providing additional information to further explain a previous statement.
meanings.sent1: The epexegetical details in the report expanded on the main findings.
meanings.sent2: She always gives epexegetical examples to support her arguments.
meanings.sent3: The epexegetical footnote in the book added a humorous twist to the story.
meanings.sent4: His epexegetical reasoning was like a roadmap guiding us through the discussion.
meanings.sent5: The presentation's epexegetical slides clarified the complex data for the audience.
